00002 
00003 int main()
00004 {
00005 
00006   XHTMLMaker* maker = XHTMLMaker::instance();
00007 
00008   XHTMLMaker::Node* body = maker->start( "Fancy Page" );
00009 
00010   XHTMLMaker::Node* h1 = maker->addNode( "h1", body );
00011   maker->addText( h1, "Kinda Fancy Page" );
00012 
00013   XHTMLMaker::Node* p = maker->addNode( "p", body );
00014   maker->addText( p, "Hi there" );
00015 
00016   XHTMLMaker::AttrMap m;
00017   m[ "href" ] = "http://www.google.com";
00018   XHTMLMaker::Node* link =
00019     maker->addNode( "a", p, m );
00020   maker->addText( link, "Fancy Link" );
00021 
00022   maker->out();
00023 
00024   return 0;
00025 
00026 }
